title: Gazebo nightly build race condition with uploader

content.raw:
One of the gazebo nightly builds failed recently because it was running concurrently with the uploader for the nightly sdformat deb:

* The [sdformat nightly build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/sdformat4-debbuilder/883/) ran first

and triggered the 

* [repository uploader job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/repository_uploader_ng/1976/) and
* [gazebo nightly build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo8-debbuilder/236/), which failed because the uploader job changed the apt repository (yesterday's sdformat nightly build was deleted) between the time the gazebo deb builder did `apt-get update` and `apt-get install`
content.html:
One of the gazebo nightly builds failed recently because it was running concurrently with the uploader for the nightly sdformat deb:

  • The sdformat nightly build ran first

and triggered the

  • repository uploader job and
  • gazebo nightly build, which failed because the uploader job changed the apt repository (yesterday's sdformat nightly build was deleted) between the time the gazebo deb builder did apt-get update and apt-get install
